option.name: originalContent
option.value:
# Use the official .NET SDK image to build the app FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 AS build WORKDIR /app
# Copy solution and project files COPY SaveApp.sln ./ COPY SaveApp/*.csproj ./SaveApp/
# Restore dependencies RUN dotnet restore
# Copy the rest of the source code COPY SaveApp/. ./SaveApp/
# Build and publish the app WORKDIR /app/SaveApp RUN dotnet publish -c Release -o out
# Build runtime image FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0 AS runtime WORKDIR /app COPY --from=build /app/SaveApp/out ./ ENV ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://+:8080 EXPOSE 8080 ENTRYPOINT ["dotnet", "SaveApp.dll"]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Use the official .NET SDK image to build the app FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:8.0 AS build WORKDIR /app
# Copy solution and project files COPY SaveApp.sln ./ COPY SaveApp/*.csproj ./SaveApp/
# Restore dependencies RUN dotnet restore
# Copy the rest of the source code COPY SaveApp/. ./SaveApp/
# Build and publish the app WORKDIR /app/SaveApp RUN dotnet publish -c Release -o out
# Build runtime image FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:8.0 AS runtime WORKDIR /app COPY --from=build /app/SaveApp/out ./ ENV ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://+:8080 EXPOSE 8080 ENTRYPOINT ["dotnet", "SaveApp.dll"]
